desc: You can give a cash donation by going to the home page and donating directly to the @givingtree_jalynn on Venmo.
title: Cash Donation
sob_story: This person is currently serving and teaching the people about Jesus Christ in the Busan, Korea area. Due to unique circumstances he could use financial support to continue his service as planned. It costs $400 each month to continue serving, so any contribution would increase the impact of his missionary service – on himself and others.

sob_story: This family is expecting a baby at the end of December. Husband just lost job after moving for said job. Makes my heart ache for this family.

sob_story: This person is a strong woman who not only cares for her children with health concerns but struggling with health concerns of her own. She works so hard managing their families business and the struggles that come with children that need a lot of care.

desc: Gender Neutral Toys that all kids in the age range can enjoy.
title: Toy
sob_story: Just recently moved across the country far away from family and struggling financially from the move so kids will only be getting one Christmas present this year!

desc: Gender Neutral Toys that all kids in the age range can enjoy.
title: Toy

desc: 2T clothing or Montesorri style toys.
title: Clothing or Toys
sob_story: This family does not have insurance and their sweet 11 month old just had a seizure. They will have to do more tests at primary children’s. I know with that bill (and their current income) they won’t be able to have the Christmas experience they were hoping to this year. The gift would be for their child.

desc: Bath bombs, face masks, lotions, massage gun, or other “spa like” items.
title: Pampering Items
sob_story: This beautiful soul is miraculously pregnant with baby number 5. After years of intense struggle and so much heartache to get pregnant with number 4, number 5 is a beautiful surprise. However, it has come with lots of mental health challenges as she navigates 4 other kiddos and being pregnant again. She also lives very far away from her friends and family. She could sure use some signs that she is loved.

desc: Something to pamper her (face mask, robe, slippers, etc), Something that helps her know she is loved.
title: A Reminder Someone Cares
sob_story: This person is doing their best. They just had their third child a couple weeks ago, was back in the ER with another child a couple days ago, and is hurting financially. She is dealing with PPD and is very much struggling.

desc: This will be added to a gift basket. Ideas include Amazon gift cards, snacks, drinks, flowers, laundry soap, dish tabs, anything of that nature.
title: "Thinking of You" Items for a Basket
sob_story: This person (20’s, and is expecting a baby boy in a week) had 2 sisters and 2 friends in a multi-fatality crash a few days before Halloween. Her younger sister and the sister’s friend passed away in the accident. I would love to put together a “thinking of you” basket or goodies and also a post Partum basket for her.

title: Paper Dolls
sob_story: This family has had a rough few years with dad working a few jobs to make ends meet and allow mom to stay home with the 4 kids. Mom just broke her hand and has 2 toddlers and an infant to care for among other responsibilities in the home. They budget really well but times are still hard.

title: Electric Fabric Cutter
sob_story: This person has endured a lot this year, her husband is very sick with an illness that will not be cured, and has recently had a miscarriage after years of trying for a baby.. She could use some love this holiday season.

desc: An Amazon gift card would be suitable for them to choose what they want.
title: Amazon Gift Card
sob_story: This family just recently bought a home that they found out is ending up needing tons more repairs than they are good to accomplish right now. Money is going toward that, they woud feel so loved with a christmas gift.

desc: A digital picture frame would be a great way to be able to view all the memories he has had with his wife.
title: Digital Picture Frame
sob_story: This man lost his wife this year to cancer.  It is a lonely feeling for him and his family.  A gift could really lift their spirits.

desc: A player for elderly dimentia, that is one person can do alone.
title: One Person Activity
sob_story: She is a widow who has lived alone for 2 decades and is very lonely.  She has no grandchildren and her children are old and live far. Being able to have any gift is something I bet she hasn't gotten in tons of Christmas.
